7.heading: Vorov.
7.title: "Death in the Deep!"
7.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: A South Seas cruise ship accidentally hits a Russian submarine, and both ships are disabled. Vorov, a Russian agent aboard the cruise ship tries to keep the Americans from getting a secret rocket launcher that's aboard the sub. Pete Trask dives to keep the Russians from destroying the launcher.
